import React, { Component } from 'react' import style from './Header.module.css' import axios from 'axios' export default class Header extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state={ user_input:"" } } handleChange = (e) => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } search = () =>{ axios.get(`https://api.github.com/search/users?q=${this.state.user_input}`) .then(response => console.log(response.data.item) ) .catch(err => console.log(err)); } render() { return (
